actions.message: IRA was also the weakest of the evil lord's CARDINAL SERVANTS so this should not be considered a significant victory. It's a dumb victory.
IRA was also so stupid that he accidentally dropped a very important item, the J-FRAGMENT ONE, for the heroes to pick up. FRIGGIN' RIDICULOUS. SO DUMB.
Nevertheless, this long and arduous battle ended with a victory by our heroes.
Now they can tell this story to drunk people at parties and get laid or something.
Realizing their world is in danger, now these heroes set out to take back the world from the evil lord!
A new day is ahead. A new day of liberation and freedom!
Until they are killed. By our wonderful evil demon lord.
Also, I wonder where Ruth Simmons is in all of this. She should probably be doing something about this.
She's probably doing something about this.
